title: Digital Game Design Process Based on Collaborative Concept Mapping for Biology

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic biological concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Linking learner roles (management/leadership) with corporate social problem-solving scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically structure core biology concepts through collaborative digital games.
Learners can accurately explain interconnections between concepts with 80%+ precision through real-time peer interaction in mobile environments.
Learners can apply knowledge organization strategies using digital games to solve real workplace problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
